channel.title: Im new to moparscape server problems with npc?
channel.description: im having problems making npc i no how to edit it and save what do i do after it save then compile my server then it works im new help :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused:

item.title: Im new to moparscape server problems with npc?
item.dc:creator: @zezi111 zezi111
item.description:
@zezi111 wrote:

[quote=“jehanne, post:2, topic:112792”]u want to spawn an npc? edit autospawn.cfg, then save, compile run. just like ur treying to say i guess.

and the next time u ask something, make it more understandable lol[/quote]Just as jehanne said go to autospawn.cfg and use the other NPC’S as examples to making yours. But you need the NPC’S ID so you can add it in your autospawn.cfg just open up the moparscape window and click Help then NPC ID’S and add it in your autospawn.cfg save,compile and run.

Read full topic
